description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) announced today that two investment advisers, Delphia (USA) and Global Predictions, have settled charges of making misleading statements regarding the use of artificial intelligence (AI) technology in their products. [...]
title: Investment advisers pay $400K to settle ‘AI washing’ charges

description: A sophisticated hacking campaign attributed to a Chinese Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) group known as 'Earth Krahang' has breached 70 organizations and targeted at least 116 across 45 countries. [...]
title: Chinese Earth Krahang hackers breach 70 orgs in 23 countries

description: Microsoft has announced that RSA keys shorter than 2048 bits will soon be deprecated in Windows Transport Layer Security (TLS) to provide increased security. [...]
title: Microsoft announces deprecation of 1024-bit RSA keys in Windows

description: Electronic Arts has postponed the North American (NA) finals of the ongoing Apex Legends Global Series (ALGS) after hackers compromised players mid-match during the tournament. [...]
title: Apex Legends players worried about RCE flaw after ALGS hacks

description: Japanese tech giant Fujitsu discovered that several of its systems were infected by malware and warns that the hackers stole customer data. [...]
title: Fujitsu found malware on IT systems, confirms data breach

description: NIST just-released its Cybersecurity Framework (CSF) 2.0, which seems to have SaaS security in mind. Learn more from Adaptive Shield about how the NIST 2.0 framework can help detect SaaS threats. [...]
title: How the New NIST 2.0 Guidelines Help Detect SaaS Threats
